name: Alex Morgan
title: Full-Stack Developer & Creative Technologist
tagline: Crafting digital experiences that inspire and engage
bio: I'm a passionate developer with 5+ years of experience building elegant solutions to complex problems. I specialize in creating beautiful, performant web applications that users love.

about.intro: With a background in computer science and a passion for design, I bridge the gap between technical excellence and user experience. My work focuses on building scalable, accessible applications that make a difference.

experience.description: Leading development of customer-facing applications serving 100K+ users
Built and scaled MVP to production with modern tech stack
Delivered custom web solutions for diverse client portfolio
